page.title: 08PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: We telephoned Eastern Counties Bus Company and asked about local bus services. We learnt that six buses run through Stoke Ash every day of the week except Sunday. They link the village with Eye, Diss, Norwich and Ipswich. Simmonds are a private company. They run a bus through Wickham Skeith. This bus goes to Diss and Stowmarket. You can catch a train at Diss or Stomarket they closed the nearest station which was Finningham. The trains go to London, Norwich and Ipswich. The nearest airport is at Norwich which is 27 miles away.You can cath a plane to Scotland or Amsterdam. The nearest port is Felixstowe. The ferries sail to Holland. You can take your car with you.
